modal.title: Data Processing Authorization
modal.subtitle: Law 1581 of 2012 - Habeas Data
modal.legal_notice: In accordance with Law 1581 of 2012, we require your express authorization to process your personal data. This authorization is necessary to provide you with our legal services.
modal.accept: I accept the processing of my data
modal.decline_notice: If you do not accept the processing of your data, we cannot provide our services and your session will be closed.
